articles.title: James Martin causes Mel Giedroyc to apologise as she interrupts cooking demo: 'Surreal!' - Express
articles.description: JAMES MARTIN caused guest and former Great British Bake Off star Mel Giedroyc to make an apology on the latest edition of his cookery show as she interrupted his cooking demonstration.
